content.rendered:
Directed by Ramesh Sippy

Written by Vipul Binjola. Kausar Munir. Rishi Virmani

Cast Hema Malini (Rukmini). Rajkummar Rao (Avinash). Rakul Preet Singh (Naina). Shakti Kapoor (Captain Uncle). Kanwaljeet Singh (Tilak (as Kanwaljit Singh)). Tarun Wadhwa (Jude). Kamlesh Gill (Rukmini’s Mother). Neeta Mohindra (Avinash’s Mother (as Nita Mohindra)). Kiran Juneja (Kannu (as Kiran Joneja Sippy)). Priya Raina (Sonu). Jagruti Sethia (Mishthi (as Jagriti Sethia)). Zoya Khan (Brownie). Kamal Sharma (Panditji). Subhash Sharma (Man with Newspaper). Akhilesh Dogra (Hat Seller). Dharmendra (External Affairs Minister). Ramesh Sippy (Stranger on Bench). Manoj Mehra (Vikas.). Sohom Pramanick (Passerby). Tawhid Rike Zaman (Naina’s Friend)

Languages Hindi

Producers Husaini Hasnain. Kiran Juneja. Dhanashree Mehta. Ravi Sarin. Hussain Shaikh. Jagbir Singh. Rohan Sippy

Production Ramesh Sippy Entertainment
